## Livre conseillé: Statistical Rethinking

> Richard McElreath, *Statistical Rethinking: A Bayesian Course with Examples in R and Stan* [@McElreath:2020]

Official links:

- {{< fa book >}} [Book page](https://xcelab.net/rm/statistical-rethinking/)
- {{< fa brands r-project >}} [R package](https://github.com/rmcelreath/rethinking)
- {{< fa brands youtube >}} [2022 lecture videos](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLDcUM9US4XdMROZ57-OIRtIK0aOynbgZN)
- {{< fa brands github >}} [2022 lecture slides and homework and answers](https://github.com/rmcelreath/stat_rethinking_2022)

Translations:

- {{< fa laptop-code >}} A. Solomon Kurz, [*Statistical Rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse: Second edition*](https://bookdown.org/content/4857/) [@Kurz:2021]
- {{< fa laptop-code >}} Vincent Arel-Bundock, [*Statistical Rethinking 2 with Stan and R*](https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/rethinking2/), [@Arel-Bundock:2020]
